results.title: Predictors of visit-to-visit blood pressure variability in patients with hypertension: an analysis of trials with an amlodipine treatment arm.
results.text_hl: BPV in the top 25th percentile was lower with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ versus other treatments (13.7 +- 3.2 vs. 14.3 +- 3.5), with single-study analyses of Anglo-Scandinavian Cardiac Outcomes Trial-Blood Pressure Lowering Arm, Antihypertensive and @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@Lipid@@@-Lowering Treatment to Prevent @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@Heart Attack@@@ Trial, and Comparison of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ Versus @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@Enalapril@@@ to Limit Occurrences of @<m>DISEASE_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@Thrombosis@@@ all showing BPV was the lowest with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@.

citations.NLM: Wang JG, Zhou D, Jeffers BW. Predictors of visit-to-visit blood pressure variability in patients with hypertension: an analysis of trials with an amlodipine treatment arm. J Am Soc Hypertens. 2017 Jul;11(7):402-411. PMID: 28624170

results.title: Relationship of antihypertensive treatment to plasma markers of vascular inflammation and remodeling in the Comparison of Amlodipine versus Enalapril to Limit Occurrences of Thrombosis study.
results.text_hl: We assessed whether 2 commonly used antihypertensive agents affected plasma biomarkers reflecting specific @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ and remodeling processes over 2 years in the Comparison of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ versus @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@Enalapril@@@ to Limit Occurrences of @<m>DISEASE_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@Thrombosis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@CAMELOT@@@) study.

results.title: Amlodipine, clopidogrel and CYP3A5 genetic variability: effects on platelet reactivity and clinical outcomes after percutaneous coronary intervention.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ is associated with increased @CHEMICAL_Clopidogrel @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077144 @@@clopidogrel@@@ OPR and increased risk of @<m>DISEASE_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@thrombotic@@@ events after PCI, which is dependent on the @GENE_CYP3A5 @GENE_1577 @@@CYP3A5@@@ genetic status.

results.title: Has the controversy over the use of calcium channel blockers in coronary artery disease been resolved?
results.text_hl: Peripheral revascularisation was slightly higher in the @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@ GITS (187/3825) than the placebo group (144/3840). The Comparison of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ versus @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@Enalapril@@@ to Limit Occurrences of @<m>DISEASE_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@Thrombosis@@@ (CAMELOT) trial compared a calcium channel blocker (@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@) and angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor (@CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@) in normotensive @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@coronary artery disease@@@.

results.title: [Effects of radiofrequency catheter ablation in coagulation system].
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: It is indicated that platelet aggregability may be introduced by RFCA, but evolution of the anticoagulant system was not caused by RFCA, This may enhance the occurrence of @<m>DISEASE_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@thrombosis@@@. @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@ASA@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ may prevent the occurrence of @<m>DISEASE_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@thrombosis@@@.

results.title: Effects of normal, pre-hypertensive, and hypertensive blood pressure levels on progression of coronary atherosclerosis.
results.text_hl: METHODS: The 274 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ who completed the intravascular ultrasound (IVUS) substudy of the CAMELOT (Comparison of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ Versus @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@Enalapril@@@ to Limit Occurrences of @<m>DISEASE_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@Thrombosis@@@) trial were included.
